name: Gaga Marketing
description:
Gaga Marketing was established January 1, 2007 by four principals, who among them have experience in developing and managing advertising, marketing, branding and design in the retail, hotel, casino, restaurant and Internet technology industries. Three of the principals have deep experience on both the agency and on the client side in intensive operational management positions.
As a result, they are particularly attuned to the internal and external demands placed upon client side executives.
